./external/basejump_stl/bsg_mem/bsg_mem_1rw_sync_mask_write_byte_synth.v Cov: 51.7% 

   1: // NOTE: Users of BaseJump STL should not instantiate this module directly
   2: // they should use bsg_mem_1r1w_sync_mask_write_byte.
   3: 
   4: module bsg_mem_1rw_sync_mask_write_byte_synth
   5:   #(parameter els_p = -1
   6:     , parameter addr_width_lp = `BSG_SAFE_CLOG2(els_p)
   7:     , parameter latch_last_read_p=0
   8: 
   9:     , parameter data_width_p = -1
  10:     , parameter write_mask_width_lp = data_width_p>>3
  11:   )
  12:   ( input clk_i
  13:    ,input reset_i
  14: 
  15:    ,input v_i
  16:    ,input w_i
  17: 
  18:    ,input [addr_width_lp-1:0]       addr_i
  19:    ,input [data_width_p-1:0]        data_i
  20:     // for each bit set in the mask, a byte is written
  21:    ,input [write_mask_width_lp-1:0] write_mask_i
  22: 
  23:    ,output [data_width_p-1:0] data_o
  24:   );
  25: 
  26:   genvar i;
  27: 
  28:   for(i=0; i

  29:   begin: bk


  30:     bsg_mem_1rw_sync #( .width_p      (8)


  31:                         ,.els_p        (els_p)


  32:                         ,.addr_width_lp(addr_width_lp)


  33:                         ,.latch_last_read_p(latch_last_read_p)


  34:                       ) mem_1rw_sync


  35:                       ( .clk_i  (clk_i)


  36:                        ,.reset_i(reset_i)


  37:                        ,.data_i (data_i[(i*8)+:8])


  38:                        ,.addr_i (addr_i)


  39:                        ,.v_i    (v_i)


  40:                        ,.w_i    (w_i & write_mask_i[i])


  41:                        ,.data_o (data_o[(i*8)+:8])


  42:                       );


  43:   end


  44: 


  45: endmodule


  46:
